column2: [Root.GetBestName] Give a Custom sum of money to other lords around Europe, Asia and the Middle East.
[From.GetBestName] Give a Custom sum of money to other lords around Europe, Asia and the Middle East.
[From.GetBestName] has graciously decided to sent us a sum of [Root.cg_var.GetValue]¤ out of their own treasury.
We thank them for their donation.
